class  osgShadow::ShadowedScene
 ShadowedScene provides a mechansim for decorating a scene that the needs to have shadows cast upon it. More...

Namespaces

namespace  osgShadow
 

The osgShadow library is a NodeKit that extends the core scene graph to add support for a range of shadow techniques.
